overview:
With multiple talents utilizing the online world, Brad Reason is a social media marketing & new media optimization specialist, as well as an expert digital strategy and online community management.

He has over a decade of experience creating and producing corporate and promotional projects and has brought skills, talents, and expertise to companies such as IBM, AMD, Intel, CBS, Orange, Electrolux, Playboy, Remedy Communications, Princeton University, Electric Sheep Company and many more.

He harnesses active, trending, creative new media, online social networking, & virtual worlds (Doubledown Tandino in Second Life) to combine marketing with internet technology, the arts, & live DJ broadcasting.

In virtual worlds (primarily Second Life, Open Grid, and Club Cooee) and immersive environments, he is a live performer and social community activist and supporter of the future of virtual world technology.
